title.rendered: Kish Airlines in  Kish Island, Iran

content.rendered:
Kish Airlines is an airline operating from Kish Island, Iran. It operates international, domestic and charter services as a scheduled carrier. The airline was established on December 16, 1989, and started operations in 1990.

Kish Airlines Contact Address, Phone and Website

Kish Airlines Address : Kish, Hormozgan Province, Iran

Phone number : +98 76 9321 4562

Kish Airlines Official website : https://www.kishairlines.ir/

Fleet size: 11

  • Airbus A321-200
  • Fokker 100
  • McDonnell Douglas MD-82
  • McDonnell Douglas MD-83

Kish Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Kish Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Kish Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Kish Airlines office in Iran Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Kish Airlines office in Iran: (click on the stars below)
